policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  labels:
    name: monitoring
  name: monitoring
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.

policy disallow-container-sock-mounts -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-docker-sock-mount validation error: Use of the Docker Unix socket is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-docker-sock-mount failed at path /spec/
2 - autogen-validate-containerd-sock-mount validation error: Use of the Containerd Unix socket is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-containerd-sock-mount failed at path /spec/
3 - autogen-validate-crio-sock-mount validation error: Use of the CRI-O Unix socket is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-crio-sock-mount failed at path /spec/
4 - autogen-validate-dockerd-sock-mount validation error: Use of the Docker CRI socket is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-dockerd-sock-mount failed at path /spec/

policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy require-labels -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/StatefulSet/caddy failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/

##### FILE: 00-caddy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/caddyfile:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  Caddyfile: |
    :80 {
      root * /wwwroot/
      file_server

      # read env basic auth snippet from https://caddyserver.com/docs/caddyfile/directives/http.basicauth
      {$BASIC_AUTH}

      respond "Welcome, {http.auth.user.id}" 200
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: caddyfile
  namespace: default

---

      # Username "Bob", password "hiccup"
      Bob $2a$14$Zkx19XLiW6VYouLHR5NmfOFU0z2GTNmpkT/5qqR7hx4IjWJPDhjvG

##### FILE: 00-caddy_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/caddy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    restarter.kubedoop.dev/enable: "true"
  name: caddy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: caddy
  serviceName: caddy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: caddy
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BASIC_AUTH
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH
              name: basic-auth
        image: caddy:2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: caddy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/caddy/Caddyfile
          name: caddyfile
          subPath: Caddyfile
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: caddyfile
        name: caddyfile

---

##### FILE: 00-caddy_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: assert-caddy-ready
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - |
      EXPECTED="Welcome,"
      while true; do
        ACTUAL=$(curl -s http://caddy:80)
        # check EXPECTED ~= ACTUAL
        if echo "$ACTUAL" | grep -q "$EXPECTED"; then
          echo "assertion passed"
          exit 0
        else
          echo "assertion failed"
          echo "EXPECTED: $EXPECTED"
          echo "ACTUAL: $ACTUAL"
          sleep 5
        fi
      done
    image: registry.access.redhat.com/ubi9-minimal:latest
    name: assert-caddy
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 100Mi
  restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready failed:
1 - validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: 00-caddy1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/caddyfile:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  Caddyfile: |
    :80 {
      root * /wwwroot/
      file_server

      # read env basic auth snippet from https://caddyserver.com/docs/caddyfile/directives/http.basicauth
      {$BASIC_AUTH}

      respond "Welcome, {http.auth.user.id}" 200
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: caddyfile
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: 00-caddy1_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/caddy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    restarter.kubedoop.dev/enable: "true"
  name: caddy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: caddy
  serviceName: caddy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: caddy
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BASIC_AUTH
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASIC_AUTH
              name: basic-auth
        image: caddy:2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: caddy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/caddy/Caddyfile
          name: caddyfile
          subPath: Caddyfile
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: caddyfile
        name: caddyfile

---

##### FILE: 00-caddy1_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/assert-caddy-ready:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: assert-caddy-ready
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - |
      EXPECTED="Welcome,"
      while true; do
        ACTUAL=$(curl -s http://caddy:80)
        # check EXPECTED ~= ACTUAL
        if echo "$ACTUAL" | grep -q "$EXPECTED"; then
          echo "assertion passed"
          exit 0
        else
          echo "assertion failed"
          echo "EXPECTED: $EXPECTED"
          echo "ACTUAL: $ACTUAL"
          sleep 5
        fi
      done
    image: registry.access.redhat.com/ubi9-minimal:latest
    name: assert-caddy
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 100Mi
  restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:

    NoOfReplicas=2

    [ndb_mgmd]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-manager-0.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=1
    datadir=/var/lib/ndb-cluster

    [ndb_mgmd]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-manager-1.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=2
    datadir=/var/lib/ndb-cluster

    [ndbd]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-data-node-0.ndb-cluster-data-node-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=3
    datadir=/var/lib/mysql/data

    [ndbd]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-data-node-1.ndb-cluster-data-node-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=4
    datadir=/var/lib/mysql/data

    [mysqld]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-server-0.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=5

    [mysqld]
    hostname=ndb-cluster-server-1.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    NodeId=6

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ndb-cluster/ConfigMap/ndb-cluster-server-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  my.cnf: |+
    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysqld]
    user                = mysql
    bind-address        = 0.0.0.0
    port                = 3306
    mysqlx-bind-address = 0.0.0.0
    socket              = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
    mysqlx-socket       = /var/run/mysqld/mysqlx.sock

    datadir             = /var/lib/mysql
    pid-file            = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.pid
    log-error           = /var/log/mysql/error.log

    ndbcluster
    max_connect_errors  = 10000

    key_buffer_size     = 16M
    thread_stack        = 192K
    thread_cache_size   = 8

    tmpdir              = /tmp
    max_connections     = 100

    #general_log_file   = /var/log/mysql/mysql.log
    #general_log        = 1
    log_error           = /var/log/mysql/error.log

    log_bin             = /var/log/mysql/mysql-bin.log
    max_binlog_size     = 100M
    binlog_do_db        = include_database_name
    binlog_ignore_db    = include_database_name


    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysql_cluster]
    ndb-connectstring   = ndb-cluster-manager-0.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net,ndb-cluster-manager-1.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net
    ndb-mgmd-host       = ndb-cluster-manager-0.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net,ndb-cluster-manager-1.ndb-cluster-manager-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net


    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysql]
    port        = 3306
    socket      = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock


    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysqldump]
    socket      = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
    quick
    quote-names
    max_allowed_packet  = 16M


    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysqladmin]
    socket      = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
    force


    # ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [mysqld_safe]
    socket      = /var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock
    nice        = 0


immutable: true
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ndb-cluster-server-config
  namespace: ndb-cluster

---

##### FILE: 00-config3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ndb-cluster/ConfigMap/ndb-cluster-balancer-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  haproxy.cfg: |+
    global
      log /dev/log    local0
      log /dev/log    local1 notice
      stats socket /var/lib/haproxy/admin.sock mode 660 level admin expose-fd listeners
      stats timeout 30s
      user haproxy

      # Default SSL material locations
      ca-base /etc/ssl/certs
      crt-base /etc/ssl/private

      # See: https://ssl-config.mozilla.org/#server=haproxy&server-version=2.0.3&config=intermediate
      ssl-default-bind-ciphers ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305:ECDHE-RSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384
      ssl-default-bind-ciphersuites TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256:TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384:TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256
      ssl-default-bind-options ssl-min-ver TLSv1.2 no-tls-tickets

    defaults
      log     global
      mode    tcp
      option  tcplog
      option  dontlognull
      timeout connect 5000
      timeout client  50000
      timeout server  50000

    frontend mysql
      bind :3306
      mode tcp
      default_backend mysql_backend
    frontend mysqlx
      bind :33060
      mode tcp
      default_backend mysqlx_backend

    backend mysql_backend
      mode tcp
      server mysql-mp1 ndb-cluster-server-0.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net:3306 check
      server mysql-mp8 ndb-cluster-server-1.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net:3306 check backup
    backend mysqlx_backend
      mode tcp
      server mysql-mp1 ndb-cluster-server-0.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net:33060 check
      server mysql-mp8 ndb-cluster-server-1.ndb-cluster-server-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net:33060 check backup

    listen stats
      bind *:9000
      mode http
      stats enable
      stats uri /
      stats refresh 60s
      stats admin if LOCALHOST


immutable: true
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ndb-cluster-balancer-config
  namespace: ndb-cluster

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: 00-exporter_1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ndb-cluster/Deployment/ndb-cluster-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    uid: 87a64c70-8594-11ef-9428-7fa2bd4fe393
  name: ndb-cluster-exporter
  namespace: ndb-cluster
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      uid: 87a64c70-8594-11ef-9428-7fa2bd4fe393
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        uid: 87a64c70-8594-11ef-9428-7fa2bd4fe393
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: ndbDataType
                operator: In
                values:
                - ndb.node
                - ndb.server
      containers:
      - args:
        - mysqld_exporter
        - ndb-cluster-balancer-service.ndb-cluster.svc.kube.askug.net:3306
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_EXPORTER_VERSION
          value: 0.15.1
        - name: MYSQLD_EXPORTER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysqld-exporter-password
              name: ndb-cluster-exporter-secrets
        image: hub.askug.net/mysql-cluster-mysql-prometheus-exporter:0.0.2-beta3
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/healthy
            port: 9104
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 60
        name: cluster-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9104
          hostPort: 9104
          name: tcp9104
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/ready
            port: 9104
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 90
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/guacamole:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: guacamole
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/guacamole:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: guacamole
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/guacamole:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: guacamole
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amitvashist7/k8s-tiny-web
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: node-port

##### FILE: 00-minio-deployment_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to velero/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    component: minio
  name: minio
  namespace: velero
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        component: minio
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - /storage
        - --config-dir=/config
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ACCESS_KEY
          value: minio
        - name: MINIO_SECRET_KEY
          value: minio123
        image: harbor.geniusafc.com/docker.io/minio:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /storage
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

##### FILE: 00-minio-deployment_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to velero/Job/minio-setup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    component: minio
  name: minio-setup
  namespace: velero
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      name: minio-setup
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - mc --config-dir=/config config host add velero http://minio:9000 minio minio123
          && mc --config-dir=/config mb -p velero/velero
        image: harbor.geniusafc.com/docker.io/mc:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mc
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/velero:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: velero
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/velero:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: velero
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/velero:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: velero
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: 00-minio-deployment1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to velero/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    component: minio
  name: minio
  namespace: velero
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        component: minio
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - /storage
        - --config-dir=/config
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ACCESS_KEY
          value: minio
        - name: MINIO_SECRET_KEY
          value: minio123
        image: minio/minio:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /storage
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource velero/Deployment/minio
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource velero/Deployment/minio failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: 00-minio-deployment1_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to velero/Job/minio-setup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    component: minio
  name: minio-setup
  namespace: velero
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      name: minio-setup
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - mc --config-dir=/config config host add velero http://minio:9000 minio minio123
          && mc --config-dir=/config mb -p velero/velero
        image: minio/mc:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mc
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---


Mutation:

  namespace: velero
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      name: minio-setup
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - mc --config-dir=/config config host add velero http://minio:9000 minio minio123
          && mc --config-dir=/config mb -p velero/velero
        image: minio/mc:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mc
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/odoo:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: odoo
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/odoo:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: odoo
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/odoo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: odoo
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/odoo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: odoo
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/nats-operator:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: nats-operator
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - apiextensions.k8s.io
  resources:
  - customresourcedefinitions
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - create
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - nats.io
  resources:
  - natsclusters
  - natsserviceroles
  verbs:
  - '*'

  - ""
  resources:
  - pods
  verbs:
  - create
  - watch
  - get
  - patch
  - update
  - delete
  - list
- apiGroups:
  - ""

  - services

  - create
  - watch
  - get

  - delete
  - list

  - update
  - delete
  - list

  - ""

  - pods/log
  - serviceaccounts/token
  - events

  - '*'
- apiGroups:
  - ""

  - namespaces
  - serviceaccounts

  - get
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - endpoints
  verbs:
  - create

##### FILE: 0-cluster-autoscaler_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cluster-autoscaler
  name: cluster-autoscaler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cluster-autoscaler
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "false"
      labels:
        app: cluster-autoscaler
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./cluster-autoscaler
        - --v=4
        - --stderrthreshold=info
        - --cloud-provider=aws
        - --skip-nodes-with-local-storage=false
        - --expander=least-waste
        - --node-group-auto-discovery=asg:tag=k8s.io/cluster-autoscaler/enabled,k8s.io/cluster-autoscaler/antonputra
        - --balance-similar-node-groups
        - --skip-nodes-with-system-pods=false
        image: k8s.gcr.io/autoscaling/cluster-autoscaler:v1.20.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: cluster-autoscaler
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
          name: ssl-certs
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: cluster-autoscaler
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-bundle.crt
        name: ssl-certs

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

##### FILE: 0-cluster-autoscaler1_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cluster-autoscaler
  name: cluster-autoscaler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cluster-autoscaler
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "false"
      labels:
        app: cluster-autoscaler
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./cluster-autoscaler
        - --v=4
        - --stderrthreshold=info
        - --cloud-provider=aws
        - --skip-nodes-with-local-storage=false
        - --expander=least-waste
        - --node-group-auto-discovery=asg:tag=k8s.io/cluster-autoscaler/enabled,k8s.io/cluster-autoscaler/antonputra
        - --balance-similar-node-groups
        - --skip-nodes-with-system-pods=false
        image: k8s.gcr.io/autoscaling/cluster-autoscaler:v1.20.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: cluster-autoscaler
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
          name: ssl-certs
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: cluster-autoscaler
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-bundle.crt
        name: ssl-certs

---

##### FILE: 0-dashboard_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --auto-generate-certificates
        - --namespace=kubernetes-dashboard
        image: kubernetesui/dashboard:v2.3.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: kubernetes-dashboard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        secret:
          secretName: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

##### FILE: 0-dashboard_13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/dashboard-metrics-scraper:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  name: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod: runtime/default
      labels:
        k8s-app: dashboard-metrics-scraper
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kubernetesui/metrics-scraper:v1.0.6
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: dashboard-metrics-scraper
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

kind: Role
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard

- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - kubernetes-dashboard-key-holder
  - kubernetes-dashboard-certs
  - kubernetes-dashboard-csrf
  resources:
  - secrets
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
  - delete
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - kubernetes-dashboard-settings
  resources:
  - configmaps
  verbs:
  - get
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services
  verbs:
  - proxy
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resourceNames:
  - heapster
  - 'http:heapster:'
  - 'https:heapster:'
  - dashboard-metrics-scraper
  - http:dashboard-metrics-scraper
  resources:
  - services/proxy
  verbs:
  - get

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard

      protocol: UDP

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

  - ""

  - proxy

  - 'https:heapster:'

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: demo
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

    matchLabels: {}

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

    matchLabels:
      app: nginx

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aputra/myapp-181:v5
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/rabbitmq-consumer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq-consumer
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq-consumer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rabbitmq-consumer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - amqp://myapp:devops123@rabbitmq.rabbitmq.svc.cluster.local:5672
        command:
        - receive
        image: ghcr.io/kedacore/rabbitmq-client:v1.0
        name: rabbitmq-consumer

---

##### FILE: 0-deployment14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fluent-bit:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fluent-bit
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fluent-bit
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fluent-bit
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - fluent-bit
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: fluent/fluent-bit:2.1.9
        name: fluent-bit

---

##### FILE: 0-deployment16.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to buildkite/Deployment/buildkite-agent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: buildkite-agent
  namespace: buildkite
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: buildkite-agent
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: buildkite-agent
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: buildkite-agent-token
        - name: BUILDKITE_UNCLAIM_CONTAINERS_VIA_API
          value: "true"
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_META_DATA_CPU_LIMIT
          value: "4"
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_META_DATA_MEMORY_LIMIT
          value: 8Gi
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_META_DATA_KUBERNETES
          value: "true"
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_META_DATA_KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE
          value: buildkite
        - name: BUILDKITE_AGENT_META_DATA_KUBERNETES_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: buildkite/agent:latest
        name: buildkite-agent
      serviceAccountName: buildkite-agent

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo/Deployment/express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: express
  namespace: demo
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: express
  template:

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hamster
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hamster
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hamster
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do timeout 0.2s yes >/dev/null; sleep 0.5s; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ubuntu-slim:0.1
        name: hamster
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 600m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:

            memory: 50Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-controller
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - nginx-controller
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: 0-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hamster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hamster
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hamster
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hamster
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do timeout 0.2s yes >/dev/null; sleep 0.5s; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ubuntu-slim:0.1
        name: hamster
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 600m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 180m
            memory: 50Mi

---

##### FILE: 0-deployment31.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fluent-bit:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fluent-bit
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fluent-bit
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fluent-bit
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - fluent-bit
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: fluent/fluent-bit:2.1.9
        name: fluent-bit

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    team: dev1
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - spot
      containers:
      - image: aputra/myapp-193:v6
        name: my-container-1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: 0-deployment4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-controller
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - nginx-controller
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: 0-deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/blackbox-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: blackbox-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: blackbox-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: blackbox-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/prometheus/blackbox-exporter:v0.23.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
        name: blackbox-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9115
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi

---

        operator: Exists

        key: azure.com/aci

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: foo
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/go-app-client:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: go-app-client
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-app-client
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /myapp
        - -maxClients=500
        - -scaleInterval=1000
        - -randomSleep=4000
        - -target=http://go-app:8000/api/devices
        image: aputra/client-180:v14
        name: go-app-client
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 3Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 3Gi
      nodeSelector:
        service: golang-client
      restartPolicy: Never
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: service
        operator: Equal
        value: golang-client

---

##### FILE: 0-go-client-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/go-app-client:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: go-app-client
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-app-client
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /myapp
        - -maxClients=30
        - -scaleInterval=4000
        - -randomSleep=90000
        - -target=http://go-app:8000/api/images
        image: aputra/client-180:v14
        name: go-app-client
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 3Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 3Gi
      nodeSelector:
        service: golang-client
      restartPolicy: Never
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: service
        operator: Equal
        value: golang-client

---

##### FILE: 0-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/rabbitmq-publish:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq-publish
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - send
        - amqp://myapp:devops123@rabbitmq.rabbitmq.svc.cluster.local:5672
        - "300"
        image: ghcr.io/kedacore/rabbitmq-client:v1.0
        name: rabbitmq-client
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: 0-linkerd-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-linkerd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-linkerd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp-linkerd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-cpu-limit: 500m
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-cpu-request: 500m
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-memory-limit: 256Mi
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-memory-request: 256Mi
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: myapp-linkerd
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aputra/service-b-172:v4
        name: myapp-linkerd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8181
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
      nodeSelector:
        service: linkerd
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: service
        operator: Equal
        value: linkerd

---


Mutation:

        ports:

          name: metrics

##### FILE: 0-metric-server_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/system:aggregated-metrics-reader:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-admin: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-edit: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-view: "true"
  name: system:aggregated-metrics-reader
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - metrics.k8s.io
  resources:
  - pods
  - nodes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: 0-metric-server_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: metrics-server
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: metrics-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: metrics-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cert-dir=/tmp
        - --secure-port=443
        - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname
        - --kubelet-use-node-status-port
        - --metric-resolution=15s
        - --kubelet-insecure-tls
        image: k8s.gcr.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.5.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: metrics-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      serviceAccountName: metrics-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 11, fail: 5, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/APIService/v1beta1.metrics.k8s.io:
apiVersion: apiregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: APIService
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: v1beta1.metrics.k8s.io
  namespace: default
spec:
  group: metrics.k8s.io
  groupPriorityMinimum: 100
  insecureSkipTLSVerify: true
  service:
    name: metrics-server
    namespace: kube-system
  version: v1beta1
  versionPriority: 100

##### FILE: 0-mongo-secret-sts_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-sts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-sts
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: eticket-mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-root-credentials
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-root-credentials
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pv-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-pv-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi
      storageClassName: do-block-storage

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mongodb-sts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongodb-sts
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: eticker-mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: Password
        image: mongo:latest
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-pv-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-pv-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi
      storageClassName: do-block-storage

kind: NetworkPolicy

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: database
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns2
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/gateway-api-example-ns2:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns2
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/gateway-api-example-ns2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns2
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/gateway-api-example-ns2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns2
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/gateway-api-example-ns1:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns1
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:

      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

  namespace: site-ns

      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gateway-api-example-ns2
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: no-external-access
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/no-external-access:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: no-external-access
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/no-external-access:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: no-external-access
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/no-external-access:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: no-external-access
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/no-external-access:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: no-external-access
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
pass: 5, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: 0-node-selector.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-node-selector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-node-selector
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      nodeSelector:
        role: spot

---

    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-admin: "true"
    rbac.authorization.k8s.io/aggregate-to-edit: "true"
  name: prometheus-crd-edit
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - monitoring.coreos.com
  resources:
  - alertmanagers
  - alertmanagerconfigs
  - prometheuses
  - prometheusrules
  - servicemonitors
  - podmonitors
  - probes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - create
  - update
  - patch
  - delete

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: 0-service-a-linkerd.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: service-a-linkerd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: service-a-linkerd
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-cpu-limit: 500m
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-cpu-request: 500m
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-memory-limit: 256Mi
        config.linkerd.io/proxy-memory-request: 256Mi
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: service-a-linkerd
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TARGET
          value: http://service-b-linkerd.default:8181
        image: aputra/service-a-172:v4
        name: service-a-linkerd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8282
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
      nodeSelector:
        service: linkerd
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: service
        operator: Equal
        value: linkerd

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/service-a-linkerd failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/
